planet.name: OGLE-2008-BLG-513 b
MOA-2008-BLG-401 b
planet.description: This planet has been discovered by gravitational microlensing. To model the lightcurve, the orbital motion of the planet was included. OGLE-2008-BLG-513 has the strongest evidence for orbital motion of the lens object seen in a microlensing event (Yee et al. 2011).

This planet has been discovered by gravitational microlensing. To model the lightcurve, the orbital motion of the planet was included. OGLE-2008-BLG-513 has the strongest evidence for orbital motion of the lens object seen in a microlensing event (Yee et al. 2011).
